messages.content: are all the angles equal in a parallelogram
No, only opposite angles are equal in a parallelogram.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel isn’t part of the European Economic Area; it's not even in Europe!
is a peck the same as a bushel
No, a peck is one-quarter of a bushel.
is the united states a part of the european union
No, the European Union is a separate entity, and the United States is not part of it.
can you build up an immunity to arsenic
No, there is no immunity to arsenic; it's harmful in any amount and can accumulate over time.
is the isle of man part of the european economic area
No, the Isle of Man isn't part of the European Economic Area.
is a tax free savings account an investment
Indeed! It serves as an investment vehicle, allowing tax-free growth on contributions.
will there be a fourth season of crazy ex girlfriend
Yes, it's already aired! It premiered in 2018 and concluded in 2019.
is anne with an e filmed on pei
Despite its setting on PEI, "Anne with an E" was actually filmed in Ontario.
is a wheel and axle a simple machine
Absolutely, it's one of the key types!
